title: "Top artificial intelligence exec leaving Meta as it breaks up his team"
excerpt: "The executive who has led Meta Platforms Inc.'s artificial intelligence unit for the past four years is leaving the company amid a reorganization that was announced on Thursday. Jerome Pesenti will leave at the end of the month as part of a move that's meant to \"leverage the newest AI technology at scale\" across the company,"
